name: youtube-music-store-ytm-playlists
description: Scrape and store IDs and titles for playlists created by YouTube Music

scripts.postbuild: tmpfile=$(mktemp /tmp/webpack-build.XXXXX) && cat ./src/meta.user.txt >> $tmpfile && echo >> $tmpfile && cat ./dist/bundle.user.js >> $tmpfile && cat $tmpfile > ./dist/bundle.user.js && rm $tmpfile

author: Jesse Jackson <npm@jcksn.org> (https://jcksn.org)
